channel.title: Skill Leveling HELP
channel.description:
When u gain a theiving level it only changes one of the two numbers on the skills.. like this 2/1 instead of the correct way... 2/2.
Thanks, help me if you can =]

item.title: Skill Leveling HELP
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Nastay:

Go into client.java on your source and search return 99 or whatever your max stat is, and if you see something with return 99 or something and its not what you wanted, change it to your level so it can return and read the max level everytime you level up

Seriously, stop pointing people there, you obviously have no idea what that is used for.

@TOPIC - Does your exp to next level change? If so, then it means that it is leveling, but not updating the label.

Read full topic
